input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Valid Values: BMC_AR_System, BMC_Atrium, HP_ServiceCenter

String Value - class name
BMC_AR_System and BMC_Atrium
Valid Values:
BMC_Account BMC_Activity BMC_AdminDomain BMC_ApplicationService BMC_ApplicationSystem BMC_BusinessService BMC_Cluster BMC_ConnectivityCollection BMC_Database BMC_Document BMC_Equipment BMC_HarwareSystemComponent BMC_LogicalSystemComponent BMC_Organization BMC_ProtocolEndpoint BMC_Role BMC_UserCommunity
HP_ServiceCenter
Valid Values:
HPSC_ComputerSystem HPSC_Contact HPSC_NetworkDevice

String Value - Key values are concept attributes that are queriable. Queriable attributes are concept attributes that have a system mapping in the query mapping document located in the module configuration.
String Value - The value of key 1.

String value - Key values are concept attributes that are queriable. Queriable attributes are concept attributes that have a system mapping in the query mapping document located in the module configuration.
String Value - The value of key 2.
An XML document containing an expression that relates key 1 and value 1 to key 2 and value 2. eg <value>key 1 > <value>'key1' > value1 and 'key1' < value2</value>.
An XML document containing an expression that relates key 1 and value 1 to key 2 and value 2. eg <value>key 1 > <value>'key1' > value1 and 'key1' < value2</value>.

An XML document that is required by BMC_Atrium that may include parameters that are used to refine and control queries. The following is an example that include default values: <query-item> <soap> <username /> <password /> </soap> <login-info> <user-id>Demo</user-id> <password>Demo</password> <lang>English</lang> </login-info> <class-name-id> <namespace-name>BMC.CORE</namespace-name> <class-name>BMC_ComputerSystem</class-name> </class-name-id> <dataset-id>BMC.ASSET</dataset-id> <get-mask>GET_MASK_NONE</get-mask> <first-retrieve>0</first-retrieve> <max-retrieve>0</max-retrieve> <sort-by>SerialNumber</sort-by> <sort-order>ASCENDING</sort-order> </query-item>

output.description: An XML document providing detail for one or more configuration items.

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure
String Value - A process specific string that explains the value of success status.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <fields> <xsl:apply-templates /> </fields> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="mappings/*"> <xsl:if test="string(@queryable) = '' or @queryable='true' "> <field> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </field> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string-length('$[key 2]') !=0"> <xsl:value-of select="//*[local-name()='${key 2}']/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="query" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <schema>${schema}</schema> <key>${key 1}</key> <value>${value 1}</value> <xsl:if test="string-length('${key 2}')>0"> <key2>${key 2}</key2> <value2>${value 2}</value2> </xsl:if> ${fields} </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="query" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <schema>${schema}</schema> <key>${key 1}</key> <value>${value 1}</value> <key2>${key 2}</key2> <value2>${value 2}</value2> <query> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </query> ${fields} </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <entries> <xsl:apply-templates /> </entries> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="entry"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="metadata" /> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="local-name(//*[class/text()='${class name}'])='ci-class-group'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">CI</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="local-name(//*[class/text()='${class name}'])='relationship-class-group'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Relationship</xsl:text> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${dataset id}') > '0'">${dataset id}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <ApplicationDetails> <soap> <username /> <password /> </soap> <login-info> <user-id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${user id}</xsl:text> </user-id> <password> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${password}</xsl:text> </password> <lang> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">English</xsl:text> </lang> </login-info> <class-name-id> <namespace-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">BMC.CORE</xsl:text> </namespace-name> <class-name>${class name}</class-name> <dataset-id>${dataset id}</dataset-id> <get-mask> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">GET_MASK_NON</xsl:text> </get-mask> </class-name-id> <a-dataset-id>${dataset id}</a-dataset-id> <a-get-mask> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">GET_MASK_NONE</xsl:text> </a-get-mask> <delete-option> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">UNCONDITIONALLY</xsl:text> </delete-option> <delete-criteria> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">id</xsl:text> </delete-criteria> <first-retrieve> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </first-retrieve> <max-retrieve> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </max-retrieve> <sort-by> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">AccountID</xsl:text> </sort-by> <sort-order> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">ASCENDING</xsl:text> </sort-order> </ApplicationDetails> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${dataset id}') > '0'">${dataset id}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <ApplicationDetails> <soap> <username /> <password /> </soap> <login-info> <user-id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${user id}</xsl:text> </user-id> <password> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${password}</xsl:text> </password> <lang> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">English</xsl:text> </lang> </login-info> <class-name-id> <namespace-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">BMC.CORE</xsl:text> </namespace-name> <class-name>${class name}</class-name> <dataset-id>${dataset id}</dataset-id> <get-mask> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">GET_MASK_NON</xsl:text> </get-mask> </class-name-id> <a-dataset-id>${dataset id}</a-dataset-id> <a-get-mask> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">GET_MASK_NONE</xsl:text> </a-get-mask> <delete-option> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">UNCONDITIONALLY</xsl:text> </delete-option> <delete-criteria> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">id</xsl:text> </delete-criteria> <first-retrieve> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </first-retrieve> <max-retrieve> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </max-retrieve> <sort-by> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">AccountID</xsl:text> </sort-by> <sort-order> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">ASCENDING</xsl:text> </sort-order> </ApplicationDetails> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <fields> <xsl:apply-templates /> </fields> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="mappings/*"> <xsl:if test="string(@queryable) = '' or @queryable='true' "> <field> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </field> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string-length('$[key 2]') !=0"> <xsl:value-of select="//*[local-name()='${key 2}']/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${dataset id}') > '0'">${dataset id}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <query> <xsl:if test="string-length('${key 1}')>0 and string-length('${value 1}')>0 and string-length('${key 2}')=0 and string-length('${value 2}')=0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${key 1} = "$[value 1]"</xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${key 1}')>0 and string-length('${value 1}')>0 and string-length('${key 2}')>0 and string-length('${value 2}')>0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${key 1} = "$[value 1]" and ${key 2} = "$[value 2]"</xsl:text> </xsl:if> </query> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="query" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <parameters> <username> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[login userid]</xsl:text> </username> <password> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${login pw}')=0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>$[login pw]</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </password> <login-info> <locale /> <time-zone /> <authentication /> </login-info> <class-name-id> <namespace-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[namespace]</xsl:text> </namespace-name> <class-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[class]</xsl:text> </class-name> </class-name-id> <query> <xsl:value-of select="//query/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </query> <attributes /> <first-retrieve> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[first retrieve]</xsl:text> </first-retrieve> <max-retrieve> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[max retrieve]</xsl:text> </max-retrieve> <sort-order> <list> <attribute-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[sort by]</xsl:text> </attribute-name> <sort-order> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[sort order]</xsl:text> </sort-order> </list> </sort-order> <dataset-id /> <get-mask> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[mask]</xsl:text> </get-mask> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${dataset id}') > '0'">${dataset id}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="query" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <parameters> <username> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[login userid]</xsl:text> </username> <password> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${login pw}')=0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[login pw]</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </password> <login-info> <locale /> <time-zone /> <authentication /> </login-info> <class-name-id> <namespace-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[namespace]</xsl:text> </namespace-name> <class-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[class]</xsl:text> </class-name> </class-name-id> <query> <xsl:value-of select="//query/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </query> <attributes /> <first-retrieve> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[first retrieve]</xsl:text> </first-retrieve> <max-retrieve> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[max retrieve]</xsl:text> </max-retrieve> <sort-order> <list> <attribute-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[sort by]</xsl:text> </attribute-name> <sort-order> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[sort order]</xsl:text> </sort-order> </list> </sort-order> <dataset-id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[datasetid]</xsl:text> </dataset-id> <get-mask> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[mask]</xsl:text> </get-mask> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${dataset id}') > '0'">${dataset id}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <query> <xsl:if test="string-length('${key 1}')>0 and string-length('${value 1}')>0 and string-length('${key 2}')=0 and string-length('${value 2}')=0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${key 1} = "$[value 1]"</xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${key 1}')>0 and string-length('${value 1}')>0 and string-length('${key 2}')>0 and string-length('${value 2}')>0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${key 1} = "$[value 1]" and ${key 2} = "$[value 2]"</xsl:text> </xsl:if> </query> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="query" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <parameters> <login-info> <user-id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[login userid]</xsl:text> </user-id> <password> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[login pw]</xsl:text> </password> <lang> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[login lang]</xsl:text> </lang> </login-info> <class-name-id> <namespace-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[namespace]</xsl:text> </namespace-name> <class-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[class]</xsl:text> </class-name> </class-name-id> <query> <xsl:value-of select="//query/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </query> <attributes /> <first-retrieve> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[first retrieve]</xsl:text> </first-retrieve> <max-retrieve> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[max retrieve]</xsl:text> </max-retrieve> <sort-order> <items> <attribute-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[sort by]</xsl:text> </attribute-name> <sort-order> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[sort order]</xsl:text> </sort-order> </items> </sort-order> <a-dataset-id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[datasetid]</xsl:text> </a-dataset-id> <a-get-mask> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[mask]</xsl:text> </a-get-mask> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${dataset id}') > '0'">${dataset id}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="query" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <parameters> <login-info> <user-id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[login userid]</xsl:text> </user-id> <password> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[login pw]</xsl:text> </password> <lang> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[login lang]</xsl:text> </lang> </login-info> <class-name-id> <namespace-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[namespace]</xsl:text> </namespace-name> <class-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[class]</xsl:text> </class-name> </class-name-id> <attributes /> <query> <xsl:value-of select="//query/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </query> <first-retrieve> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[first retrieve]</xsl:text> </first-retrieve> <max-retrieve> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[max retrieve]</xsl:text> </max-retrieve> <sort-order> <items> <attribute-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[sort by]</xsl:text> </attribute-name> <sort-order> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[sort order]</xsl:text> </sort-order> </items> </sort-order> <a-dataset-id> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[datasetid]</xsl:text> </a-dataset-id> <a-get-mask> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">$[mask]</xsl:text> </a-get-mask> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <fields> <xsl:apply-templates /> </fields> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="mappings/*"> <xsl:if test="string(@queryable) = '' or @queryable='true' "> <field> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </field> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string-length('$[key 2]') !=0"> <xsl:value-of select="//*[local-name()='${key 2}']/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This process will find configuration items for a given variable. Variables are the elements defined in the Configuration Management concept. BMC_Atrium queries must be formed using application system source attribute names. eg Status, AccountID and SerialNumber. Queries are formed by creating a regular expression using the attributes. eg. AccountID!=NULL.
